msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Walla Walla County Government; Clerk, Territorial Court Civil/Criminal Case Files, 1860-1889

div1.p:
Territory of Washington
County of Walla Walla
In the District of the 1st Judicial District

Charles Gahres & Martha J Garhes Plffs
vs
W H Barrett Isabella Barrett Defts

The Defendants for answer to Plaintiffs complaint ans 1st that on the 12th day July 1871 at the city of Walla Walla in an action brought in this court herein Charles Gahres & Martha J Gahres was Plaintiffs and W.H. Barrett & Isabella Sutton now Isabella Barrett Defendants herein was defendants in said action. For the same cause of action as that alledged in this cause and said defendants renounce Judgement against said Plaintiffs in said cause duly given upon the merits and these defendants was by the said Judgement awarded the care and custody of the
said child Etta Dora Cravens and that the said Plaintiffs pay the cost of said action. Wherefore Defendants pray Judgement that Plaintiffs proceedings be dismissed and that they have and recover there costs in this proceedings
W.A. Gorge & B. L. Sharpstein Attys for Defts
